about_the_game:
This DLC adds to the game additional episode with short story, which takes place long before the events of the original game.
We will be able to see the happy Alex who does not yet drink and has a loving and caring wife.

How to start this DLC:
After installing DLC, you will need to load 16 save file in the main game Simple Story - Alex.
